name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-time-management
title: Time Blocking Schedule Prompt
shortDescription: This AI Builder prompt designs a schedule to optimize time usage
longDescription: Designs a schedule to optimize time usage

metadata.value: Create a time management plan for a workday, given these tasks and priorities [priorities] . Take into account the meetings already in place for the day [meetings] and display a breakdown of focus allocations by time. Format response as HTML.
